text:
@SpeakerPelosi @WHO Wait ✋🏽, genius!!! So, the same body that folded to the CCP and who sang the CCP’s tune as directed- leading to ALL COVID-19 losses & 189 countries having been crippled financially, should continue receiving US funding?!

Why stand with the WHO, when they are a proxy of the CCP?
